name: Nuit Blanche (WilliamOuimet)
description:
In this game you have to protect the guests of your hostel from being killed to get the best rating in "InnAdvisor". Try to get as many stars possible !

This game was made in a college game jam called "Intercollégial de Valleyfield" hosted by Valleyfield. The theme was "Auberge" (Inn), and there secondary objectives: put a red ballon somewhere, make the player able to jump, hide easter eggs and put soviet propaganda.

Our team won the first price

Team: Andréa Bleau-Landry, Daphne Chan, David Gougeon, Guillaume Levasseur, William Ouimet  and Victor Racicot
